We really need  a real Sinhalese leader, who can say that this is a Sinhalese Buddhist country with 75% Buddhists, and to give its due place for Buddhism. that he/she will be able to run the country with an impartial manner, not interfere with judiciary, fair in judgements, people friendly person with good inspirations.!!!
Also keep migrant racist minorities in their place, warn them on their racist activities and that they have absolutely no right destroy our ancient Buddhist Temples,  and to threaten the country's sovereignty and same rules and regulations should be applied from North to South and East to West in  the country.!!! 
A leader who is capable of thinking about the country's future, infrastructure and develop the country, as we have many natural resources in this country to make it a developed country in all sectors.!!!
Those racist minorities against such rules/regulations should be deported to wherever they come from, for the rest to live in peace and harmony.!!!

comments.comment:
Viewers please get to time stamp 0.12 of this video -   Is Ganasara, ( as he so says here) , really  wishing  to have a "Sinhala Nayakaiyo"  ? , It could well mean that his "Sinhala Nayakaiyo" could  then also profess  the Christian faith (whether it be a Catholic, Methodist, Anglican, or even "assembly of god" or any others  accepting the Bible)  .  IF SO - will he see that all attacks on sinhala christian places of worship (eg the one which took   place at Hikkaduwa) cease.
       OR - Is Ganasra hiding behind the the facade of his statement  "Sinhala Nayalayo"  while what he has in his mind is a "SINHALA BUDDHIST NAYAKAYA"  -  If , my dear Ganasra, you really have the latter in mind - namely a "SINHALA BUDDHIST NAYAKAYA" , then come out in the open, without beating about the bush.  What we believe is you want to hoodwink  all Sinhalese Christians, get their votes for your "Sinhala Nayakaiyo". and then dance the merry devil.

comments.comment: Sinhala nayakayec thamai inne nethan damalada  muslimds inne  anee manda monaka kiyawanawada kiyala  pissuda manda hire idala awanm paw nodi  pansalata wela inna ayeth hira bath noka
comments.author: Abdual Kamarudheen

replies.replyComment: Helayan ediriyee parayan baluwena bawa methaninda oppu wiya..ubala hodatama dannawa nidan inna sinhayoo aharunaama kohomada kiyala..e hinda ubalage daruwanta vath inna thanak ona nam oya puka wage thiyena gon kata wahagena hitiyoth  paduwe inna puluvanwei
Ponnayo katawHan idapiyaw danwath ata deka thalaganne nathiwa
Ponnayanta ponnakama thiyan inna baruva kiyawanawa..ubala patthakata wela idapalla..ubala oya  mohandakarayen galawagannath inne me hamuduruwo..eka mathakathiyagsnin paharayo
mn hithane uta mongol vanda athi ....
Ou thamath innawa sinhalayan athare paatata rewatena minissu.

comments.comment: Ape hamuduruwange katha karana vidiha katawath adala Naha kiyanne aththa ...budu saranay oba wshanseta
